types:type.name: Order
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Order = {| orderData: {| poNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, signatureRequiredFlag: Boolean, shipInstructions: String, giftWrapFlag: Boolean, giftWrapMessage: String, currencyCode: String, subTotal: Number {"typeId": "double"} |}, items: Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, category: String, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, size: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"orderData\\\":{\\\"poNumber\\\":123473,\\\"signatureRequiredFlag\\\":false,\\\"shipInstructions\\\":\\\"Dont break it\\\",\\\"giftWrapFlag\\\":true,\\\"giftWrapMessage\\\":\\\"You rock!\\\",\\\"currencyCode\\\":\\\"USD\\\",\\\"subTotal\\\":41.5},\\\"items\\\":[{\\\"id\\\":12345,\\\"category\\\":\\\"T-Shirt\\\",\\\"quantity\\\":4,\\\"size\\\":\\\"M\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":34567,\\\"category\\\":\\\"Hoodie\\\",\\\"quantity\\\":2,\\\"size\\\":\\\"M\\\"}]}"}
